DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test whether use screw-retained implant crown customize zirconia abutment result biological , technical esthetic outcome similar obtain cemented all-ceramic crown customize zirconia abutment , make computer-aided design manufacturing procedure ( CAD/CAM ) . DOC.brief_title: To Compare Cemented Versus Screw-retained Implant-supported Single Crowns With Customized Zirconia Abutments
DOC.criteria: Singletooth Straumann Bone Level anterior maxilla mandible At least one adjacent natural tooth present Implant position enable screwretained cemented crown Informed consent sign Smoking 15 cigarette day Poor oral hygiene ( Plaque index 30 % ) Pregnancy date inclusion
